_symbol_format: .TICKER YYMMDD P/C STRIKE  (positive qty = buy, negative = sell)
rationale: Max premium collection, expecting pin at 600

entry_conditions.notes: Maximum premium collection strategy. Enter when expecting price to pin near center strike. Tighter RSI range than iron condor â€” needs strong conviction on range.

pnl_drivers.max_profit: Net credit received (largest of any neutral strategy)
pnl_drivers.primary_driver: Theta decay â€” ATM options have highest time value to decay
pnl_drivers.secondary_driver: IV crush â€” short ATM options have highest vega

greeks_profile.theta: strongly positive â€” ATM options decay fastest
greeks_profile.vega: strongly negative â€” ATM options most sensitive to IV
greeks_profile.delta: near zero at entry (ATM straddle center)
greeks_profile.gamma: strongly negative â€” high risk if price moves away from center

pnl_drivers.ideal_scenario: Price pins at center strike at expiry. Collect massive premium. Best risk/reward of neutral strategies if price cooperates.
